Posts.Content: Dear ladies, I am post menopausal so was prescribed Arimidex after breast cancer.  ISUFFEREDfor 3 months with nausea, bone and joint pain, I was so weak I could hardly carry a shopping bag, but the GOOD NEWS IS YOU DONT HAVE TO SUFFER ON ARIMIDEX.  I switched toTAMOXIFEN7 MONTHS ago and the side effects are minimal.  I improved immediately once I switched,  good luck dont suffer in silence.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Hi KY2bfree I consulted with my Oncologist before I switched from Arimidex to Tamoxifen,  He agreed and prescribed Tamoxifen, I don't suggest just stopping any medication without first consulting with your specialist. Regard , Bobby
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years
